metadata.Title: CVE-2018-11813 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: libjpeg 9c has a large loop because read_pixel in rdtarga.c mishandles EOF.

criterions.comment: libjpeg-turbo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
libjpeg6b: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
libjpeg9: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
